doc.dc_title_s: Pitner's 1920 Map of Albemarle County, VA. Only inset of Charlottesville, Virginia.
doc.dc_description_s: * Published by Carl Pitner, 404 Star Bldg., Washington-D.C.  * Detailed inset map of Charlottesville at 1:6000 scale.  * Shgeoserver white schools, high schools, colored schools, churches, improved roads, unimproved roads, district boundaries and railroads.  * Also includes historic places and landmarks.  * Other copies (not this one) were issued with printed statement 'Compliments of the National Bank and Trust Co., Charlottesville, Va.' * Multiple georeferenced versions: minimally adjusted (linear transformation: #1) and maximally adjusted (cubic transformation + rubbersheeting adjustment: #4).
